note:
Hi. I am gradually relearning communication skills after a traumatic brain injury and then a major stroke. This is my first experience with social media. Because I have been isolated while recovering, my wife helped me set up this account - she is my 'social media tutor'.
I am interested in social justice and environmental issues, politics, music, history, humour, and more.
In my free time I enjoy listening to music and watching sci-fi movies and series.
